data.title: Excellent hair cut and coloring
data.text: I always love going to this salon. Been using it for years and will keep doing so as they always get the results I am looking for.

data.title: Fun!
data.text: Intuition Salon and Spa is a fun, professional, laid back atmosphere to get your hair and beauty needs done in. The stylist do an amazing job. Highly recommend.

data.title: Vintage Wedding hair & make-up
data.text:
For my trial wedding hair & make up, I was referred to this salon by a friend of mines mom. I was very very nervous- but my stylist kelly made me feel comfortable and took the time to listen to what I wanted. I had been to 3 other salons in the St Pete area, but did not feel confident they could pull of the vintage theme I was looking for.
So I decided to have them do me and my wedding parties hair & make-up done there  the day of the wedding. I had 6 brides maids, 2 flower girls. We were going for a vintage style theme and we got that. I was very nervous, but this salon was able to do to pull it off and they didn't seemed stressed about it at all. This turned out to be a very good experience. We had to get dressed there and it was very nice because they had 2 bathrooms!

data.title: The Best Salon and Spa
data.text: Intuition Salon and Spa is the best salon hands down. I've been going to Dawn for the last 10 years and I won't go anywhere else. I've tried other high end salons in the area and there is just no comparison. Dawn is a Master stylist and she lives up to the name, there really should be another level above that because she is in that category. She is the best of the best. I have a cut and color done and am always so happy with it. She uses all organic, vegan and cruelty free products and my hair is in great condition. The salon is relaxed and comfortable, so you don't feel intimidated, like in some other salons. Dawn and the entire staff are amazing, professional, friendly and competent. Besides hair, I've had my nails done and facials and love it all. I can't say enough good things about this salon, I'm so happy I found it.

data.title: Spa party large group of girls
data.text: We went a few weeks ago to this salon and spa. We had a large group of girls and had all the services manicures, pedicures, facials, massages, and even make up. They stayed past closing time to finish our service. And didn't complain. The appointments took a while to schedule but the gentleman Rolando who was also our massage therapist made sure we were organized. Id recommend this company to travelers.

data.title: I LOVE this salon!
data.text: I am a local, & I've been going to this salon for a few months, now. The ladies working here are so sweet, and so helpful, not to mention their mad skills! I deal with people who travel here for vacations, & since I discovered this salon, I've been recommending it to everyone I come across that's visiting the area. They have spa services, as well as the usual salon stuff (cuts, color, etc.), so even if you just need a massage, they've got you covered. I got one there a couple months ago with this girl Alex, and it was incredible! If you're planning on visiting the Pinellas County area, I'd definitely give this place a try.
